elementToolbarChildNode.description: Title for the child node of the highlighted element in tracking mode

elementToolbarHelp.description: Help message for the element toolbar
elementToolbarHelp.message: Use tracking mode to move over the page and highlight elements. Click an element to disable tracking mode.

elementToolbarHighlightedElement.description: Title for the highlighted element in tracking mode

elementToolbarNextSibling.description: Title for the next sibling node of the highlighted element in tracking mode

elementToolbarParentNode.description: Title for the parent node of the highlighted element in tracking mode

elementToolbarPreviousSibling.description: Title for the previous sibling node of the highlighted element in tracking mode

elementToolbarToggleOff.description: The off state text for the tracking mode toggle button

elementToolbarToggleOn.description: The on state text for the tracking mode toggle button

elementToolbarTrackingMode.description: Label for the tracking mode toggle button

errorLocal.description: Error message to show when someone tries to run the extension in a chrome extension page
errorLocal.message: Extensions cannot run in local chrome pages for security reasons

errorWebStore.description: Error message to show when someone tries to run the extension in a the chrome web store
errorWebStore.message: Extensions cannot run in the chrome web store for security reasons

extDescription.message: Draw a ruler to get pixel dimensions and positioning, and measure elements on any web page.

optionsHideUpdateTabHelp.description: Message explaining how the do not show update tab checkbox is used
optionsHideUpdateTabHelp.message: Do not show the update tab whenever a new version of the extension is installed

optionsHideUpdateTabLabel.description: The label for the do not show update tab checkbox

optionsPageTitle.description: Page title for the options page

optionsStatisticsHelp.description: Message explaining how the anonymouse usage statistics is used
optionsStatisticsHelp.message: Information collected contains no personal information and is used solely for the purpose of improving this extension by seeing which sections are used

optionsStatisticsLabel.description: The label for the send anonymouse usage statistics checkbox

toolbarBottom.description: Label for the bottom input in the toolbar

toolbarClose.description: Tooltip for the toolbar close button which closes the addon

toolbarColor.description: Label for the color picker in the toolbar

toolbarDisableElementMode.description: Label for the disable element mode button (element as in HTML element)

toolbarDockBottom.description: Tooltip for the dock bottom image
toolbarDockBottom.message: Dock toolbar to the bottom of the page

toolbarDockTop.description: Tooltip for the dock top image
toolbarDockTop.message: Dock toolbar to the top of the page

toolbarEnableElementMode.description: Label for the enable element mode button (element as in HTML element)

toolbarGuides.description: Label for the show guides toggle in the toolbar

toolbarHeight.description: Label for the height input in the toolbar

toolbarHelp.description: Lable for the help button in the toolbar

toolbarLeft.description: Label for the left input in the toolbar

toolbarRight.description: Label for the right input in the toolbar

toolbarTop.description: Label for the top input in the toolbar

toolbarWidth.description: Label for the width input in the toolbar

updateCodeTitle.desciption: Title for the code section in the contributors side box

updateContributeTitle.desciption: Title for the contribute side box

updateContributorsTitle.desciption: Title for the contributors side box

updateDoNotShowPageAgain.description: Label for the do not show this page again checkbox on the update page
updateDoNotShowPageAgain.message: Do not show this page again

updateHistoryTitle.desciption: Title for the update history section

updateIconsTitle.desciption: Title for the icons section in the contributors side box

updateKeyBoardShortcuts.description: The title for the keyboard shortcuts section

updateKeyboardShortcutsRuler.description: Title for the ruler arrow keys section

updateKeyboardShortcutsRulerCtrl.message: + Ctrl (Command): Expand the ruler outwards by 1 pixel

updateKeyboardShortcutsRulerCtrlAlt.message: + Ctrl (Command) + Alt: Shrink the ruler inwards by 1 pixel

updateKeyboardShortcutsRulerKeys.message: Arrow keys: Move the ruler by 1 pixel in any direction

updateKeyboardShortcutsRulerShift.message: + Shift: Move the ruler by 10 pixels

updateKeyboardShortcutsRulerShiftCtrl.description: Arrow keys + Shift + Ctrl shortcut description
updateKeyboardShortcutsRulerShiftCtrl.message: + Shift + Ctrl (Command): Expand the ruler outwards by 10 pixels

updateKeyboardShortcutsRulerShiftCtrlAl.description: Arrow keys + Shift + Alt shortcut description
updateKeyboardShortcutsRulerShiftCtrlAl.message: + Shift + Ctrl (Command) + Alt: Shrink the ruler inwards by 10 pixels

updateKeyboardShortcutsToolbar.description: Title for toolbar inputs shortcut keys section

updateKeyboardShortcutsToolbarDownShift.description: Down key + Shift input shortcut description

updateKeyboardShortcutsToolbarUpShift.description: Up key + Shift input shortcut description

updatePageHeader.description: Header message for the page containing the new version number
updatePageHeader.message: Page Ruler has been updated to version $VERSION$

updatePageHeaderInstall.description: Header message for the update page when a new user installs it
updatePageHeaderInstall.message: Thank you for installing Page Ruler!

updatePageTitle.desciption: Page title for the update page

updatePageTitleInstall.description: Page title for the install page

updateReportIssue.message: Report an Issue or Make Suggestion

updateSupportText.message: Page Ruler is and always will be free. If you have a spare moment please support it by leaving a review and letting everyone else know what a great and useful tool it is.

updateSupportText2.description: Second line of the support section text
updateSupportText2.message: If you are feeling especially awesome and generous, some users have asked if they can make a donation to say thanks for Page Ruler. I would rather any money went to a cause more worthy than myself so if you would like to say thank you at the same time as helping a charity that is close to my heart it would make my day :)

updateTip.description: Message informing users about the shortcut key
updateTip.message: Extra Tip: Use the Alt+P shortcut to enable and disable Page Ruler, or assign a different shortcut from the Keyboard Shortcuts section in the Extensions tab

updateTranslateDescription.desciption: Description of how to find out how to contribute a translation
updateTranslateDescription.message: Want to use Page Ruler in your own language? Visit the GitHub project page and follow the instructions on how to submit a translation.

updateTranslateTitle.desciption: Title for the translate section in the contribute side box

updateTranslationsTitle.desciption: Title for the translations section in the contributors side box
